title: "15 Minutes" - time lapse computer assembly in 720p
description:
"15 Minutes" is a time lapse movie that shows me assembling a PC.

This is the full release in 720p (1080x720) with an XviD Avi.

You can check out a smaller version here if you want to save your bandwith:

Details:
~900 pictures taken over a span of about 15 minutes, then merged into an XviD Avi using VirtualDub and AviSynth.
The camera used was a Canon EOS350D and a 24-105F4L lens, a Manfrotto tripod and a 141RC 3 way head.

The music is "7 Ghosts I" from Nine Inch Nails which is licensed under Creative Commons. Thank you Trent!
Get the full album here: http://ghosts.nin.com

More details will be available here:  <a href="
http://www.andreasmayer.at/blog/wp" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.andreasmayer.at/blog/wp</a>

Thanks for watching!

Andy
